title: Bell pull
medium:
Medium: silk, wool, linen, cotton, brass handles
Technique: counted stitch embroidery in silk and wool on linen canvas, cotton plain cloth, brass handles
description: Bell pull made of canvas with embroidery, arranged as cross borders, in floral and geometric designs; brass handles at either end, pierced in design of Chinese type. Embroidery in canvas stitches. Backed with yellow cotton plain cloth.
